subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar penalized the Sprint Cup championship contender Kurt Busch by holding his racecar on pit road for the first 15 minutes of practice at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon because Busch’s team was caught with an extra set of tires.
snippet: Nascar penalized the Sprint Cup championship contender Kurt Busch by holding his racecar on pit road for the first 15 minutes of practice at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon because Busch’s team was caught with an extra set of tires.
